name: Celestial
text: Choose a creature. Until the end of your next turn, whenever that creature deals damage to a player, it deals that much damage to the other player instead.
flavor: "I have seen the stars, and I have seen the moon. I have seen the sun, and I have seen the planets. I have seen the stars, and I have seen the moon. I have seen the sun, and I have seen the planets."

rulings.text: If the creature is a planeswalker, it can't be affected by Celestial.

name: Celestial Purge
text:
Destroy all enchantments.
Draw a card.
flavor: "The stars are calling to me. I must answer."

rulings.text: Celestial Purge doesn't destroy enchantments that are on permanents that aren't on the battlefield.
